channel.title: Runserver Help
channel.description:
[b]When I open the runserver file it says [/b]
[code=java] 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command , operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
[b]When I edit the runserver it says[/b]
[code=java]@echo off color 0a title Allstar-Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
[b]I dont know how/what to edit on the runserver file.
Can you comment what I should change?
Note: I have windows 7 and I also have Java\jdk1.6.0_18[/b]

item.title: Runserver Help
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

When I open the runserver file it says 

 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command , operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

When I edit the runserver it says

@echo off color 0a title Allstar-Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

[b]I dont know how/what to edit on the runserver file.

Can you comment what I should change?

Note: I have windows 7 and I also have Java\jdk1.6.0_18[/b]
